languages.text: "Поверьте, Теодора фон Валанциус велела поступить с преступником надлежащим образом. Мы его... сервиторизовали. Так что теперь он выполняет свой долг перед Империумом безусловно и безукоризненно".

traits.locale_text: "Поверьте, Теодора фон Валанциус велела поступить с преступником надлежащим образом. Мы его... сервиторизовали. Так что теперь он выполняет свой долг перед Империумом безусловно и безукоризненно".

languages.text: "Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."
languages.original_text: "Поверьте, Теодора фон Валанциус велела поступить с преступником надлежащим образом. Мы его... сервиторизовали. Так что теперь он выполняет свой долг перед Империумом безусловно и безукоризненно".

traits.locale_text: "Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

"Have no doubt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. My predecessor gave me a vivid account of the hapless fool's public execution on Lady Theodora's orders. The court servitor that now keeps the house's seals was assembled from his remains."

"Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

"Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

"Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

"Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

languages.text: « Rassurez-vous, Théodora von Valancius s'est arrangée pour que le coupable soit châtié comme il se doit. Il s'est vu infliger la Servitude Imperpituis, Votre Seigneurie... Il sert désormais l'Imperium sans réserve et sans faire d'erreurs. »
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

traits.locale_text: « Rassurez-vous, Théodora von Valancius s'est arrangée pour que le coupable soit châtié comme il se doit. Il s'est vu infliger la Servitude Imperpituis, Votre Seigneurie... Il sert désormais l'Imperium sans réserve et sans faire d'erreurs. »

languages.text: “请放心，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯女士已经对责任人进行处理了。他已经被改造成了机仆，大人。他此刻正在全心全意、毫无差错地履行着对帝国的职责。”
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

traits.locale_text: “请放心，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯女士已经对责任人进行处理了。他已经被改造成了奴工，大人。他此刻正在全心全意、毫无差错地履行着对帝国的职责。”

languages.text: "Seid versichert, Theodora von Valancius hat befohlen, den Missetäter angemessen zu bestrafen. Servitut Imperpituis, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Er erfüllt seine Pflichten dem Imperium gegenüber nun ohne Zurückhaltung oder Fehler."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

traits.locale_text: "Seid versichert, Theodora von Valancius hat befohlen, den Missetäter angemessen zu bestrafen. Servitut Imperpituis, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Er erfüllt seine Pflichten dem Imperium gegenüber nun ohne Zurückhaltung oder Fehler."

languages.text: «Por supuesto. Theodora von Valancius hizo que castigaran al malhechor como es debido. Servidumbre Imperpituis, {mf|milord|milady}. Ahora sirve al Imperium sin reservas ni errores».
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto. Theodora von Valancius hizo que castigaran al malhechor como es debido. Servidumbre Imperpituis, {mf|milord|milady}. Ahora sirve al Imperium sin reservas ni errores».

languages.text: 「ご安心ください、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様は、この悪党に相応の処分を命じました。不眠奉仕の刑です、陛下​。彼は今や、ためらうことも、間違うこともなく帝国への義務を遂行しています」
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

traits.locale_text: 「ご安心ください、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様は、この悪党に相応の処分を命じました。不眠奉仕の刑です、陛下​。彼は今や、ためらうことも、間違うこともなく帝国への義務を遂行しています」

languages.text: "Ondan şüpheniz olmasın. Theodora von Valancius, bunun suçlusunun hak ettiği cezayı bulmasını sağladı. Müebbet Hizmet {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Artık İmparatorluk'a olan vazifelerini tereddütsüz ve hatasız bir şekilde yapıyor."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, Theodora von Valancius ordered to have the malefactor dealt with accordingly. Servitude Imperpituis, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He now performs his duties to the Imperium without reservation or error."

traits.locale_text: "Ondan şüpheniz olmasın. Theodora von Valancius, bunun suçlusunun hak ettiği cezayı bulmasını sağladı. Müebbet Hizmet {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Artık İmparatorluk'a olan vazifelerini tereddütsüz ve hatasız bir şekilde yapıyor."
